snippet: Japan beat the United States, 1-0, in the Algarve Cup, but both teams are seeing progress since their previous meeting in the World Cup final.
abstract: Japan beat the United States, 1-0, in the Algarve Cup, but both teams are seeing progress since their previous meeting in the World Cup final.

headline.main: Japan's Women Repeat Their Win Over U.S.
headline.print_headline: Japan 1, United States 0: Japan’s Women Repeat Their Triumph Over the U.S.
